items.sentence: I can\'t tell you the reason why I did that.
I\'m sure it won\'t be difficult to do that.
Tom wasn\'t given the chance you and I were.
Who\'s the most intelligent person you know?
I doubt something like that would upset Tom.
I dried myself with the towel Tom handed me.
Tom noticed how much weight Mary had put on.
Tom noticed something strange was happening.
Tom now knows the truth about how Mary died.
Tom changed into something more comfortable.
The noise didn\'t seem to bother Tom at all.
I\'m pretty sure Tom won\'t be here tonight.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom didn\'t kiss Mary.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom knows we\'re here.
Tom lives in an old building on Park Street.
Tom kept on working even though he was sick.
Tom knelt down and lifted up the floorboard.
Tom refused to give Mary what she asked for.
Tom refused to listen to anything Mary said.
Tom refused to sing the song Mary requested.
